JSRDotNETSDK Reference

InstrumentOpenCriteria Methods

InstrumentOpenCriteria Class  See Also

The following tables list the members exposed by the InstrumentOpenCriteria type.

Methods
Name Description
AddAllowedInterface Adds an allowed interface.
AddAllowedInterfaces Adds an array containing the list of allowed interfaces.
AddOpenOption Adds an open option to the criteria object. And open option has a string name, which should be one of the open option names in the plugin metadata.
AddPortToExclude Adds a port to exclude when the plugin will search for instruments. If this list is empty, then all ports will be searched. The "port string" is specific to the method used for searching for instruments: e.g. COM port for SERIAL, IP Address for ETHERNET, etc.
AddPortToInclude Adds a port to include when the plugin will search for instruments. If this list is empty, then all ports will be searched. The "port string" is specific to the method used for searching for instruments: e.g. COM port for SERIAL, IP Address for ETHERNET, etc.
Equals (Overloaded) Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object. (inherited from Object).
Finalize Allows an Object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the Object is reclaimed by garbage collection. (inherited from Object).
GetHashCode Serves as a hash function for a particular type. (inherited from Object).
GetOpenOption Looks for an open option by name. Returns string result if the option is present, or null if it is not.
GetOpenOptionNames Looks for an open option by name. Returns string result if the option is present, or null if it is not.
GetOpenOptionsSpec Gets open options specification.
GetType (Overloaded) Gets the Type of the current instance. (inherited from Object).
GetValidOpenOptionNames returns an array of the names of all the open options that can be set. If there are none, it runs an array of size 0.
GetValidOpenOptionValues Returns an array of values that can be set for the given open option name. If the open option isn't in the list of valid options, an empty list will be returned.
Initialize Initializes this object, called by all constructors to create members.
MemberwiseClone Creates a shallow copy of the current Object. (inherited from Object).
ReferenceEquals Determines whether the specified Object instances are the same instance. (inherited from Object).
RemoveAllOpenOptions Removes all open options.
RemoveOpenOption Removes an open option from the criteria object.
ToString Returns a String that represents the current Object. (inherited from Object).
Validate Validates this object.
validateOpenOption Validates the open option described by openOptionName.
